segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, streaming down the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying dishes, not noticing the water or the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the boy standing on a stool, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s really stretching, and the stool looks unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, waiting for a cookie, not noticing the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should turn around and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she’s not doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the scene outside the window looks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden is so peaceful, unlike the chaos inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get caught before they get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really taking a risk, standing up there like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees the mess and the children.
segments.speaker: PAR
